Name: Learning Web Development Through Wordpress
Description: Learn the basics of web development through WordPress by utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP.

Contents.Text: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system (CMS) based on PHP and MySQL. WordPress is installed on a web server that is either part of an Internet hosting service or a network host in its own right. The first case may be a service like WordPress.com, for example, and the second case could be a computer running the software package WordPress.org.
We will be focusing on creating our own self-hosted WordPress service using a software called XAMPP which emulates web servers.

Author: University of Aryan

Chapters.Name: The Setup
Chapters.Description: We setup our development environment by installing XAMPP, VSCode, and WordPress
